facts.fact_text: Retail sales in Slovakia fell by 5% year-on-year in December 2025.

evidences.evidence_text: Retail sales in Slovakia fell by 5% year-on-year in December 2025

facts.fact_text: This decline follows a 3.2% drop in the previous month.

evidences.evidence_text: following a 3.2% drop in the previous month.

facts.fact_text: The 5% drop marked the sharpest decline since September 2023.

evidences.evidence_text: This marked the second consecutive month of contraction in retail sales, and the sharpest since September 2023

facts.fact_text: Sales declined further for food, beverages, and tobacco (-19.9% vs -12.6%).

evidences.evidence_text: as sales declined further for food, beverages, and tobacco (-19.9% vs -12.6%)

facts.fact_text: Sales declined for non-specialized stores (-2.5% vs 0.6%).
Sales declined for other goods in specialized stores (-2% vs 0.5%).

evidences.evidence_text: other goods in specialized stores (-2% vs 0.5%)

facts.fact_text: Activity increased for ICT equipment (8.8% vs 2.9%).

evidences.evidence_text: activity increased for ICT equipment (8.8% vs 2.9%)

facts.fact_text: Activity decreased at a softer pace for cultural and recreational goods (-6.7% vs -12%).

evidences.evidence_text: while it decreased at a softer pace for cultural and recreational goods (-6.7% vs -12%)

facts.fact_text: Activity decreased at a softer pace for trade outside stores, stalls, or markets (-14.8% vs -17.5%).
entities_mentioned: trade outside stores, stalls, or markets

evidences.evidence_text: and trade outside stores, stalls, or markets (-14.8% vs -17.5%)

facts.fact_text: Sales also recovered for automotive fuel (4.2% vs -0.6%).

evidences.evidence_text: Sales also recovered for automotive fuel (4.2% vs -0.6%)

facts.fact_text: Sales also recovered for products via stalls and markets (10.5 vs -17.5%).

evidences.evidence_text: products via stalls and markets (10.5 vs -17.5%)

facts.fact_text: On a monthly basis, retail trade recorded a flat reading in December from a 0.7% drop in the previous two months.

evidences.evidence_text: On a monthly basis, retail trade recorded a flat reading in December from a 0.7% drop in the previous two months.

evidence.evidence_text: Retail sales in Slovakia fell by 5% year-on-year in December 2025
